contentList.content: You ignore disadvantage from attacking with a ranged weapon within [1]. You also gain a +1 bonus to ranged weapon attacks.
As a bonus action, you can enter a Defensive Stance until your next turn. While in this stance, your Armor Class increases by 1 and you gain an extra Reaction.
Enter a Defensive Stance. Until the start of your next turn, your Armor Class increases by 1 and you gain an extra Reaction.
While you are not wearing heavy armor or wielding a shield, your Armor Class increases by 1, your movement speed increases by [1], and your jump distance increases by 50%.
When an enemy hits an ally within [1], reduce the damage by 1d10 + Your Proficiency Bonus. You must be able to see the attacker.
Deal an additional 2 damage with thrown weapons.
You gain one superiority dice and learn the Riposte maneuver from the Battle Master subclass.
You learn the Shillelagh and Guidance cantrips. Wisdom is your spellcasting modifier for them.
You learn the Sacred Flame and Guidance cantrips. Charisma is your spellcasting modifier for them.
